## Standard Response Template

```
✅ Already integrated in Universal Tuya Zigbee v5.5.929!

Your device fingerprint is supported. Install from:
https://homey.app/a/com.dlnraja.tuya.zigbee/

After installing, RE-PAIR your device.
If issues persist, send a diagnostic report from app settings.
```

## Bug Report Response (#1344)

```
The _TZ3000_bgsigers / TS0201 sensor is supported in v5.5.929.

Troubleshooting steps:
1. Update to latest version
2. RE-PAIR the device (remove + add again)
3. Check battery level
4. Send diagnostic report if still not working

Install: https://homey.app/a/com.dlnraja.tuya.zigbee/
```
